prompt: Write email to my POC name garima vermas telling her that i am not able to come to office because of the personal reasons now write this in a profesional way

sections.content: Please accept this email as notification that I will be unable to come to the office today, [Date], due to personal reasons.

I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. I will have limited access to email and phone during this time. If your matter is urgent, please contact [Colleague's Name] at [Colleague's Email Address] or [Colleague's Phone Number].
I expect to be back in the office on [Date of Return, if known, otherwise omit this sentence]. I will address any outstanding items upon my return.
